title: Activity-Centered Mathematics Project Design: Innovative Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of middle school-level basic mathematical concepts and computational skills
context.additional_context: Building Collaborative Learning Environments Using Digital Tools, Emphasizing Mathematical Modeling for Real-World Problem Solving

learning_goals: Learners can establish mathematics project plans by applying the three stages (analysis-design-implementation) of the ACAD framework
Learners can divide team roles and collaborate in PBL environments to solve real-world workplace mathematics problems
Learners can visualize and present mathematical modeling processes using digital tools (graphing calculators, coding platforms, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
